LanguageData.DMS_Chameleon_Tank_Turret.label: Revolver Cannon
LanguageData.DMS_Chameleon_Tank_Turret.description: A highly automatic revolver cannon designed for anti heavy mech purposes. It can launch several anti-tank tungsten core armor-piercing projectiles in a very short time and accurately destroy targets within range.
LanguageData.DMS_Chameleon_Tank_Turret.gizmoDescripti:
Select Target.
Fire for effect
<color=#b0e0e6>CE Ammo:</color> 76.2x385mmR Cannon shell
